norm_pdf(x, pdf)[source]
preparePdf_data(varDict, mode='b2dk_LL')[source]

Import constructed data sets and construct PDFs with RooFit functions. PDFs and data sets are saved together in a new RooWorkspace

Parameters:

  • configDict – a dictionary containing the values of PDF shape parameters

  • year – which subset of data to fit, can be any single year of data taking, or ‘Run1’, ‘Run2’, ‘All’.
